post.body: k...we will keep ya in prayers...let us knw if u need anything! Love u guys!
sry yall r sick! We love u guys soooo much! Yall comin Wed night?
Im all clogged up...coughing and sneezing and watery eyes and runny nose :-(
we have GOT to get together SOON!!!! I feel lk we hvnt spoken in forever!
hey!!!! I miss u soooooo much!!! Girl Im sick too! Whts wrng wth Tony? And u?
awww wish u were here wth us! Pizza and oreo pie!
maybe not but I hv a kid ur age and unfortunately sometimes thts true!
hee hee!
Im stn in my lvn room burnin up!
glad u said frappe...not crappe hahaha! Sry....sinus meds mk me loopy ;-))
hey can u put Isaacs jckt in ur ofc for me? He lft it in the cafe. Its a black puff jckt frm gap.
hee hee! I was gonna cook ths lst wk but forgot to thaw it so ckn it now.
me too....its my parents! Lol jk jk
how cute r they!?!
will do girlie! Anything we can do?
txt me ur address so I can send u guys a christmas card. 762-2280
can u direct msg me ur address for christmas card?
txt me yalls address
can u send me ur address thru txt for cmas crd? 762-2280
Its still got tags on it....soooo cute!
Ed Hardy bby outfit came 2day...hv to brng 2 shw u tonite! Cnt wait to see her in it!
yes thy do! Rebecca did awesome on Lexis hair!
Yes Caleb haha! He just finally decided he was rdy!!! So proud!
love u 2!
could u txt me ur address so I can send u guys a christmas card? 762-2280
tell everyone hey for me! Wish I could be there!
sry but prolly wnt be able to. No way to get there. Ill try nxt Fri.
mornin to u! Love u!
It has helped me get thru a rly rotten day...its amazing how hard the enemy attacks when he thinks hes losin u for good!
thx! cant wait til she gets here!
so I dunno...maybe a cpl 2 litrs of soda or somethin if u just feel lk u need to tk somthin.
I think so...although my opinion may be a little biased
Im pretty sure @britnich21 knws how
doubt thered be any volunteers to lay hands on tht area hahaha!
he was gtnround fine ths am...lol...I think he will be ok hee hee.
I laughed all the way to the movies and then kept giggling randmly whn I thought bout it.
he was laughin and hollern..."its knottin up its knottin up" hahaha.
I was laughing so hard it took me a while to get it typed out to tweet.
love u 2! Dont thank me...thank @Sam_S hes the one who provided the entertainment lol.
thx!
girl whts ur address??? Tryin to send u a christmas card lol.
nice!!
was thnkn the same thng.
yes they do...my 8 yr old neice has a cell phone!!
no tht was @chrisdickson Im sitn bhnd u guys/blue satin shirt wth big preggo belly. Lol.
me too!! No brainer!
Ill just tk ur word on tht!!
Yea, I understand! you have to do what u have to do when it comes to family! Its important!
how r ya? u feelin btr?
nite becca! love u guys!
I understand that, my sis is the same way...doesnt understand the relationship between me and my church fam!
when I am stuck with Noggin on tv all day I wanna watch grown up stuff at night, but @Sam_S just wnts to watch more toons!
ugh cant stand it when @Sam_S watches cartoons...bleah
Tell her she needs to come! Will she be at church tomorrow? If so Ill tell her!
we will miss u!
oh my!
me too! Jst hopin ths one will wait a little longer than last one. we r shootin for at least 38 wks!
a little uncomfortable 2day but ya knw thts to be expected at 3o wks preg...blessed with a hlthy pregncy so cnt complain! :-)
ok just lemme know!
anything I can do to help with angel tree?
U must be watchin Dark Knight too...
Im starvin but the lasagna has to cool. :-( whatcha gonna eat?
oops sry I forgot ur fastn...Ill hv to mk u a veggie lasagna!
I had it done when my hair was waist length...it took 5 hrs and cost a fortune lol.
shave it! Lol jk!!
He needs lotsa prayer. We r tkn dwn the drug affiliated stuff...totally ovrhaulin it!
he only got 2 go tht onc cuz he hd tkn a dy off. Cnt now. Hes retail stre mgr. At chrstms tme its nuts!
k...will miss ya.
aww thx! Im rly gonna try to mk starbucks in the am...10??
hmmm good question lol..if u wnt one direct msg me ur address and Ill mail it!
we can only hope shes got some Becky in her...lk the voice...the drive...etc etc lol.
knws how shes supposed to act in walmart!!! #rol
she seems especially fond of the drums...lol...must be bc we hv such an awesome drummer lol.
speakin of the story of Elizabeth...the babe in me leaps during praise and worship...lol
sometimes I thnk shes grwin up too fast...she doesnt look 11 sometimes!
yes she did!
me too!
thx for the encouragement!
true but just dont thnk its my calling to wrk wth tht age grp. Sometimes I thnk ppl thnk bc I hv 3 kids and anthr...
k thx.
k Ill hv Sam call him. Thx!
thanks!
we probably will but Im still lookin at some others...lol
thanks...just so frustrating! One lady was so excited to tell me tht her dogs name was Bella lk it was the best news evr!
Lexi and Sam r both feelin undr the wthr.
let us knw if @allisonpaschal needs anythng!
be careful!
yea! Sry ur hvn it so rough. Tk care of u! Ur important to God and us!
be careful and tk care of urself!
I was sick sat night til today...had lost 6 lbs at doc today...hope ur feelin btr!
is there anythng u need me to do to help?
went to doc today. 1cm and go wkly frm now on.
not tryinto b rude lol just wnted to knw whtime to put on the invites Im sending to my fam members lol.
pam and andrea txt me lst sunday to ask where I was reg. Im reg at walmart.com,target.com,babiesrus.com
I hvt been there so didnt knw. @sam_S said it was in t the bulletin thngie so I didnt knw. 4 is grt.
sry if Im the interruption lol...love u!
Ill txt Pam and ask. Hows the nap?? lol
Be outta pocket for cpl hrs...no signal at house in the Vlg...back on in a few!
Hdn to cln a house in the Vlg...not sure how Im gonna get thru it...need prayer for supernatural intervention!
Just took casserole out of ovn. Pies r chillin...wtn for hubby to get home so we can head to grp.
jst made 2 oreo cream pies. 1 for mens grp. 1 for wmns grp. also mkn chsy chckn noodle casserole for men.
Got house clean...got hot so Im coughin my head off. Eatin an ornge-drnkn grape juice. VitC ovrload!
gotta go to walmrt to pck up a site2store order & get cleanin supp. gotta get motivated to cln ths house!
tryin to gain some energy for the day...runnin on fumes...feelin lk crud and wntn to go bck to bed!
Kids r gtn rdy 4 school. @Sam_S has lft 4 wrk. I am still feelin crappy. Hv a ton 2 do 2dat but dnt feel lk it.
Wnt home and chnged and hdn to eat lunch wth the Mccalebs.
Decided to wrap gifts in bedroom while kids r distracted.
done eatn dinr. Lexis wrkn on project due 2mrw. Boys r wtchn "Fly me to the Moon". thnkn I need to go wrap presents.
cookin a turkey...injected it wth creole butter flavoring...smellin good!
got christmas cards done...pick em up later...I need addresses of u guys! txt em to me 762-2280
Sams runnin late frm wrk today...lvn for church shortly...with the whole crew in tow.
Just sliced a fresh pineapple for an after school snack.
Just got home aftr bein gone all day wth the rents!
been shopn wth my parents. At drs ofc wtn. bout 30 min early for appt. gonna go pick up Christmas cards and wrk on addrssng thm ths aftrnoon
Eatn at cracker barrell with my parents and my big boy...who by the way is potty trained now!
bout to hd to twn...doc appt at 130...gonna hv bfast wth the rents in twn and go shpn wth them.
Got evryone off to wrk and school. Just got outta shwr. Got doc appt at 130.
well Calebs eatn the fruit tht Isaac wouldnt eat after mom put in her 2 cents lol...
Folding a mtn of laundry
Calebs watchin "Bah-Humduck:A Looney Toons Christmas" gotta love Daffy Duck lol.
Watchin my DVRed episode of Survivor...Greys is up nxt!
Up and gtn kiddos goin...
Nite all!
the thought Im living by today...Never doubt in the dark what you learned in the light.
Hdn to Lexis first ever band concert.
I knw why Im bein attacked today but it doesnt mk it any easier to deal wth...I knw God will get me thru ths.
just feelin lk a pretty rotten person all round today...Just need to say Peace Be Still!
sux whn satan tries to remind u of how imperfect u rly are...mks u wonder how anyone could evr love u.
feeling lk the cause of a lotta pain for a lotta ppl right now...
And I ended up hurting ppl who mean everythng to me...and hurting myself in the process.
Ths has been a rough day...Ive been dwn all day and I let tht interfere wth othr situations.
Hvn a trky bacon and chs sandwich and calebs hvn a cheese stuffed hot dog.
Night all...soooo sleepy!
Oops again...last tweet was @britnich21
Movie ovr?
Oops last tweet was @britnich21
Shes mkn some kinda soups... @becca_echols is tkn brwnies...Im tkn crm chs/rotel/ssg dip n chips.
Bout rdy to head to chillin wth the Wells...
http://twitpic.com/qqvb - My super gorgeous daughter, Lexi!!!
Just took buncha pics of Lexi. Bout to go online to mk her christmas cards for friends.
Eatn at cracker barrell with a cute boy and a pretty lady!
All dressed and rdy...fightin a headache but feelin pretty good.
Gtn rdy to head to twn...putn my face on so I dont scare small children lol.
Got Lexi some chckn noodle soup...hdn to pick up a huge batch of ironing...bleah :-(
Poor Lexi...Shes lookin pitiful in the recliner wth a cold rag on her face...poor baby :-(
Lexi is sick ths morn. Isaac got off to school. Caleb and I are eatn honeycomb for b'fast.
Tryin to get Caleb to bed. We hv read "Chica Chica Boom Boom" and "Mooseltoe"...
Playin a game wth the fam...
Got a case of the blaaaaaahhhs
Sitn on the couch watchn TV wth hubby...gotta get up and mk supper soon.
Got Lexis cards done...hdn home.
Eatn free pizza for lunch...gotta tk Lexi to Walgreens to mk her Christmas cards.
Show love by not fixing evrythng...what a concept!
Woot woot for the tweeters!
Ok the locust and crawfish have officially killed the appetite lol.
well ppls I think Im bout done for the night, cnt go much more, very tired! Hopin tomorrow is a little btr than today, love you guys!
Jst got a call, cnt clean the house in Vlg tmrw cuz the dudes in bed wth flu...
I hv lookd a cpl plces but didnt see anythng...
I gotta buy an ornament for the brunch...Im prolly the only one who hasnt gotten one yet.
http://twitpic.com/rk74 - How cute is this?!?!?!
Im messin around on my laptop and @Sam_S is watchin "The Dark Night"
Lsagnas dne.smls yum.Gotta tk Lexi 2 gt nails dne tmrw. She hs 2 b at the Austn at 5 fr pics thn Holly ball.
Lasagnas in oven...made pnutbutr fudge wth pecans and butterscotch pecan clusters.
Lexi is mkn Caleb a fort of cardboard boxes...lol
Brwnin meat for homemade lasagna...Sams playin the Wii wth the kids, vry loudly!
Had on a blck shirt...got bleach on it...now its speckled lol...starvin! Hurry up sonic ppl lol!
Been wrkn on Jordans room..hdn to pck up lunch for me and sis...
Gonna annoint and pray ovr evrythng in his room!
Btw Jordan is young man who shot slf in head and survived...comin home frm hosp 2mrw.
Thrift store shoppin wth sis for room shes redoin for Jordan...gonna help her wth it later.
Made breakfast burritos ths am...kids r off to school...Sams off to wrk...Calebs slepn...I have a min of silence!
Got Isaac tkn a bath...Lexis dryin her hair and doin mkup...mornins movin along!
Ironing Sams clothes...Lexis in shwr...all the boys r still sleepin.
Done wth lunch...wishn I could lie dwn for a bit...buuuut...I dont rly see tht happenin!
Brushin some ginger teriyaki marinade on the burgers...smells yum!
Mkn burgers and hot dogs and smoked sausage for lunch.
Not to do wh sermon but if u wnt a coupon to get employee discnt at walgrns for dec 19-21 see me.
A slip of the foot u may soon recover but a slip of the tongue u may nvr get ovr! #rol
The tongue is the most unruly part of body..soooo true #rol
My sis and bro in law r kinda wiggly in their seats now tht tongues came up lol...
Need all the pwr I can get #rol
Man I gotta get in the habit of the #rol thng!
Be aware of how the enemy can use ur old nature!
Be angry but sin not! #rol
Wow...nevr thght bout tht! #rol
Lexi and I r cleanin Isaacs room and gtn Caleb moved into it wth him.
...on the way tht I must wanna work with kids. But things Ive been thru in my life have soooo equipped me much better to wrk with teens.
tht last tweet was part of a direct msg tht got posted on here. oops sry!
on!
can certainly mk othr plans. No prob. I actually told Sam the othr night tht Id much rather wrk wth teens than wth sonbeams lol. Love u ...
Anyone woprk on refrigerators or knw someone who does?? Thnk ours is needin help. Not coolin right :-(
Been goin thru baby clothes. Not a whole lot I can use since they r 9 yrs old lol...
Made it to sisters house in the bck of the Village.
Sister is lkn for a Wii for a friend...doesnt seem to be one in the state of AR! Checked evrywhere!
Do thy not realize hw bad it mks me feel? I just wanna scream!
and they say it lk its gonna mk me feel rly good about it...I am actually considering chngng her name bc of it.
vry frustrated bc I hv had lk 3 or 4 ppl ask wht Im namin the baby and when I tell em Bella they say "my dogs name is Bella!"
Been doin laundry and cleanin...hdn to my sisters in a bit.
Vry frustrated wth Isaac...dont understand why he acts so horrible sometimes!
Poor Lexis got wht I had. Shes miserable. Hope the othr two kids r spared!
Mkn supper for the kids...sent vegan chili and baked potaotes to John and @Sam_S for their super small grp tonight.
Kids home. @Sam_S home early. Im finally gtn ovr ths bug. Gtn rly excited and nervous bout my sweet baby girls impending arrival.
Hmmmm hope my mom can mk it.
It was announced and was in the bulletin but hvnt been there...sending invites to my family.
I need to let my mom and sisters knw...
